title: Best Gambling Show Ever - Saints-Cardinals Bets + Dak's return for Cowboys, will 49ers upset Chiefs?
itunes:title: Best Gambling Show Ever - Saints-Cardinals Bets + Dak's return for Cowboys, will 49ers upset Chiefs?
description:
Alex Monaco and Liv Moods prepare their favorite picks for Kyler Murray and the Cardinals vs Alvin Kamara, Andy Dalton and the Saints on Thursday Night Football. They then look ahead to Sunday's Week 7 games of the NFL season and share their favorite bets for Patrick Mahomes and the Chiefs vs Jimmy Garoppolo and the 49ers, Dak Prescott making his return as the Cowboys take on Jared Goff and the Lions, Aaron Rodgers and the Packers against Ron Rivera's Commanders, and much more! #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
